full_text: al B)ER Eien 2016/KER/46 IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM PRESENT: THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE B.KEMAL PASHA MONDAY, THE 4TH DAY OF JANUARY 2016/14TH POUSHA, 1937 Crl.MC.No. 13 of 2016 () SC. NO.251/2015 OF ADDITIONAL DISTRICT & SESSIONS COURT, ERNAKULAM. PETITIONER/ACCUSED: ANEESH KUMAR, AGED 35 YEARS, S/O. ANANDAN, PAZHAYIDATHU VEEDU, MALIANKARA, MOOTHAKUNNAM P.O, ERNAKULAM DISTRICT. BY ADV. SRILV.A.PRADEEP KUMAR. RESPONDENT/COMPLAINANT: STATE OF KERALA, REPRESENTED BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA. BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR SMTP. MAYA. THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 04-01-2016, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: rs. al B)ER Eien 2016/KER/46 Cri.MC.No. 13 of 2016 APPENDIX PETITIONER'S ANNEXURES:- ANNEXURE A1 COPY OF THE FIR NO.119/2015 ALLEGED OFFENCE UNDER SEC. 354(A) (1) OF IPC, 7 & 8 OF POSCO ACT ON THE FILE OF THE POLICE STATION, VADAKKEKKARA. ANNEXURE A2 COPY OF THE CHARGE SC NO.251/2015 ON THE FILE OF THE ADDL. SESSIONS COURT, ERNAKULAM. RESPONDENT'S ANNEXURES:- NIL. HTRUE COPY// P.S. TO JUDGE rs. 2016/KER/46 B.KEMAL PASHA, J. CrLM.C. No. 13 of 2016 Dated this the 4" day of January, 2016 ORDER Heard the learned counsel for the petitioner and the learned Public Prosecutor. 2. Annexure-A2 final report in Sessions Case No.251/2015 of the Additional Sessions Court, Ernakulam (for the trial of cases relating to atrocities and sexual violence against women and children) is under challenge. 3. It seems that charge has been framed in the matter. The offences alleged against the petitioner is one under Section 354A(1) IPC and Section 7 read with Section 8 of Protection of Children from Sexual Offences Act. 4. On hearing the learned counsel for the il a 2016/KER/46 Crl.M.C. No. 13 of 2016 = 2: petitioner, it has come out that the present stage is too premature to take a view that the charges against the petitioner will not lie in the matter. This Court is satisfied that the matters pointed out by the learned counsel for the petitioner can be taken up before the court below during trial. With liberty to the petitioner to take up the very same questions before the court below during trial, this Crl.M.C. is disposed of. Sd/- B.KEMAL PASHA, JUDGE stu/04.01.2016
